ygData.subject: Re: boots
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 32 I am still wearing cloth shoes AC 2 wieght .5 I dont think I will replace them till I can get a pair of furlined slippers. I just havn t seen
ygData.messageBody:
At level 32 I am still wearing cloth shoes AC 2 wieght .5 I dont think I
will replace them till I can get a pair of furlined slippers. I just havn't
seen anything else that was worth replacing my shoes with for the weight. as
up until I got my box of abu kar I was always at 14 pounds with my
equipment.
----- Original Message -----
From: Reedo <reedo@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 12:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] boots


> From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
>
> The Bear Hide Boots are great for casters but I think they are a little
> heavy for monks. They have a 2.5 weight. As a monk trying to keep my
> weight down that just adds up to much.
>
> Mark
>
> Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
> http://www.24689.com
>
> > From: Dean Becker <beckerd@...>
> >
> > I have a pair of Bear hide boots from Chanda Miller at the fire outside
> > Surefall glade. They look like boots, good AC and not too heavy. I got
